name: Animal Rescue
description:
Animal Rescue is a 1-player educational puzzle game for the Apple II.

A bad troll lives in a cave under the zoo, and he has kidnapped one of the animals who lives there. The player must discover which animal is missing, and rescue him from the troll's underground cave.

The player explores the park by moving in 4 directions, which represent different location. In these various locations, the player encounters logic puzzles, which must be solved to advance the story and obtain items. Gameplay is divided into 3 parts, exploring the park to find out which animal was kidnapped, exploring the tropical house to discover the troll's cave, and exploring the cave itself to rescue the lost monkey.
